and don't do anything else but DM and you know game you're going to burn

possible which should I try to do with my tile escapes and my dungeon blocks
you can just build whatever you need quickly from the pieces you have and you

it's going to be them some big PC store or have to get to the game store or
whatever and you spent all this time doing it when you could have spent all

if you do make a homogeneous piece it is going to look really really good
but on the other hand you may not be able to use it again ever and you spent
all this time building it so that can be a burnout effect too another thing that

every single hall you know you might just have a few set-piece encounters in
